Unforgettable Memories on your Special Day

At Everlasting Events, we understand how important your special day is and we want to help you create the perfect day that you will remember fondly for years to come.

We are dedicated to providing you with a truly unforgettable experience by working with the highest quality local vendors and providing you with the best services.

Total Wedding Setup

A Dream Elegant Wedding Made Reality

Planning a wedding is an exciting, but often overwhelming experience. With so many details to consider it's no wonder many couples turn to wedding planners for help.

We worked with a professional wedding planner to bring our dream wedding to life, from start to finish. The planner helped us choose a venue, design a theme and more.

Unleashing Your Wedding's Full Potential

Our experienced team of wedding planners iscommitted to providing exceptional service and expert guidance to couples in need of professional wedding planning.

We understand that every couple is unique, and we take great care to tailor our services to your individual needs, ensuring that your wedding is a reflection of you.
